https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8YNlKjkgTmZrDy45Uhh256BGIxE.jpg Set after the 1988 OVA movie Red Shoulder Document: Roots of Ambition and months before the events of the VOTOMS television series, Pailsen Files explores the origins of Chirico Cuvie as explained by the Red Shoulder Battalion's now-disgraced commander, Col Yoran Pailsen. Compilation of the Pailsen Files OAV series. Armored Trooper VOTOMS: Pailsen Files The Movie
